cast.overview: After sparing a girl's life during a massacre, an elite Triad assassin is targeted by an onslaught of murderous gangsters.
cast.title: The Night Comes for Us

details.biography:
Morgan Oey (born Handi Morgan Winata on May 25, 1990, in Singkawang, West Kalimantan) is an Indonesian actor, singer, and model. He first gained recognition as a member of the boyband SM*SH before shifting his focus to acting after leaving the group in 2013.

After departing from SM*SH, Morgan proved his talent in acting by starring in various feature films. His film debut was Assalamualaikum Beijing (2014), followed by roles in Ngenest (2015), Sweet 20 (2017), Belok Kanan Barcelona (2018), and Eggnoid (2019). He also starred in Losmen Bu Broto (2021) and several popular web series.

Known for his versatility, Morgan has played a wide range of characters, from drama and comedy to fantasy. Besides acting, he remains active in music and frequently collaborates with various musicians. With his steadily growing career, Morgan Oey is now recognized as one of Indonesia’s prominent actors in the entertainment industry.
details.name: Morgan Oey
